pullRequest.title: Fix entity properties not being sent to vanilla clients at all
pullRequest.bodyText:
Sorry, my SEntityPropertiesPacket filter was utterly broken and just sent out packets with a 0 entity ID.
This causes vanilla clients to not see attribute changes at all.

commit.message: Fix VanillaConnectionNetworkFilter sending out invalid entity properties packets without an entity ID

nodes.bodyText: Won't using Collections.emptyList throw an UnsupportedOperationException when adding the snapshots further down the line? Shouldn't we use a new ArrayList?
